description: Ministry of Water Supply & Drainage - Acquisition of land in Galawigewatta, Nivithigala D/S Division, Ratnapura District for the construction of water storage tank of the Nivithigala W.S.scheme. Acquisition of land in Kiriella, Kiriella D/S Division Ratnapura District as it is required by the Board being the block of land on which the pump house of the Kiriella W.S. scheme has been constructed
